com.code_connoisseure.space_invaders.enteties

Class AnimatedBoxGameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.code_connoisseure.space_invaders.enteties.AnimatedBoxGameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicEnemy, PlayerShip, Projectile

    public abstract class AnimatedBoxGameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class represents a basic box shaped, animated on-screen object that can move and fire projectiles and is bound-checked to stay inside the visible screen area.
    Author:
    Yannic Wehner

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AnimatedBoxGameObject.Directions
      This enum represents the four directions the object will be able to move in.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected org.mini2Dx.core.engine.geom.CollisionBox collisionBox
      The collisionBox provides the object it's shape and boundary.
      protected com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Sound damageSound
      If provided this sound is played when the object is damaged.
      protected com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Sound destructionSound
      If provided this sound is played when the object is destroyed (lives drop to zero).
      protected int lives
      Represents the health of the object.
      protected org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.Animation<org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.Sprite> objectAnimation
      Contains the different frames of the object animation.
      protected int sheetFrameHeight
      The height of a single animation frame on the sprite sheet.
      protected int sheetFrameWidth
      The width of a single animation frame on the sprite sheet.
      protected float speed
      The amount of pixels the object moves with each call of the move method in a given direction.

        protected int sheetFrameHeight
        The height of a single animation frame on the sprite sheet.

      • speed

        protected float speed
        The amount of pixels the object moves with each call of the move method in a given direction.

      • lives

        protected int lives
        Represents the health of the object. The object won't be able to move or shoot if it drops to zero by default.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimatedBoxGameObject

        public AnimatedBoxGameObject(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture spriteSheet,
                             float x,
                             float y,
                             int sheetFrameWidth,
                             int sheetFrameHeight,
                             float animationDuration,
                             boolean looping)
        Parameters:
        spriteSheet - A texture containing the frames of the object animation.
        x - The x-position of the upper left corner of the object in the Cartesian coordinate system.
        y - The y-position of the upper left corner of the object in the Cartesian coordinate system.
        sheetFrameWidth - The width of a single animation frame in the spriteSheet in pixels.
        sheetFrameHeight - The height of a single animation frame in the spriteSheet in pixels.
        animationDuration - The time in seconds a single animation cycle will take.
        looping - Should the animation be looping?

        animationDuration - The time in seconds a single animation cycle will take.
        looping - Should the animation be looping?
        lives - The amount of hp the object should have.

      • AnimatedBoxGameObject

        public AnimatedBoxGameObject(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture spriteSheet,
                             float x,
                             float y,
                             int sheetFrameWidth,
                             int sheetFrameHeight,
                             float animationDuration,
                             boolean looping,
                             int lives,
                             float speed,
                             com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Sound destructionSound,
                             com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Sound damageSound)
        Parameters:
        spriteSheet - A texture containing the frames of the object animation.
        x - The x-position of the upper left corner of the object in the Cartesian coordinate system.
        y - The y-position of the upper left corner of the object in the Cartesian coordinate system.
        sheetFrameWidth - The width of a single animation frame in the spriteSheet in pixels.
        sheetFrameHeight - The height of a single animation frame in the spriteSheet in pixels.
        animationDuration - The time in seconds a single animation cycle will take.
        looping - Should the animation be looping?
        lives - The amount of hp the object should have.
        speed - The amount of pixels the object moves with each call of the move method in a given direction.
        destructionSound - The sound that plays when the objects life reaches zero.
        damageSound - The sound that plays when the objects is damaged.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Prepares the collision box for further changes and updates the object animation based on delta.
        Parameters:
        delta - Provided by mini2Dx. The time span between the current frame and the last frame in seconds. Might be smoothed over n frames.

      • interpolate

        public void interpolate(float alpha)
        Calculates the render coordinates of the object.
        Parameters:
        alpha - Provided by mini2Dx. Will be between 0.0 and 1.0, representing how much of an update to simulate, i.e. 0.5 means it is halfway through an update.

      • render

        public void render(org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.Graphics g)
        Renders the object on the screen.
        Parameters:
        g - Provided by mini2Dx. Common interface to graphics rendering functionality.

      • fireProjectile

        public boolean fireProjectile(java.util.ArrayList<Projectile> projectiles,
                              float speed)
        This method will add a new projectile to the given projectiles container ('fire it').
        Parameters:
        projectiles - Projectile container to which the new projectile will be added.
        speed - The amount of pixels the projectile moves with each call of the move method.
        Returns:
        Returns whether or not the projectile was successfully added to the projectiles container.

      • move

        public boolean move(AnimatedBoxGameObject.Directions xDirection,
                    AnimatedBoxGameObject.Directions yDirection)
        Moves the object in the given direction if the move is legal as defined by moveInBounds.
        Parameters:
        xDirection - The x-direction the object should move in.
        yDirection - The y-direction the object should move in.
        Returns:
        Returns whether or not the move could be executed successfully.

        public boolean contains(org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Shape shape)

        Parameters:
        shape - The shape that should be checked.
        Returns:
        Returns whether or not the shape is contained in collisionBox.
